name: HSP_TX_HAR_LIST
description: This table contains IDs of hospital accounts that transactions were transferred from.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: XFER_FROM_HAR_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account this hospital billing transaction was transferred from.
